name: Cardiology
description: Focuses on diagnosing and treating heart and blood vessel disorders — think heart attacks, arrhythmias, and hypertension

name: Neurology
description: Deals with the nervous system: brain, spinal cord, and nerves. Covers conditions like epilepsy, stroke, and Parkinson’s disease.

name: Orthopedics
description: Specializes in bones, joints, ligaments, and muscles. Common cases include fractures, arthritis, and joint replacements.

name: Gynecology
description: Cares for the female reproductive system — menstrual disorders, fertility, pregnancy, and menopause.

name: Pediatrics
description: Manages health of infants, children, and adolescents — from vaccinations to developmental disorders.

name: Dermatology
description: Treats skin, hair, and nail conditions — acne, eczema, psoriasis, and skin infections.

name: Gastroenterology
description: Focuses on the digestive system — stomach, intestines, liver, and pancreas. Think ulcers, IBS, and hepatitis.

name: Ophthalmology
description: Covers eye health — vision problems, cataracts, glaucoma, and corrective surgeries.

name: ENT
description: Also called Otolaryngology. Manages sinus issues, hearing loss, throat infections, and voice disorders.

name: Psychiatry
description: Deals with mental health — depression, anxiety, schizophrenia, and behavioral disorders.

name: Urology
description: Focuses on urinary tract and male reproductive system — kidney stones, UTIs, prostate issues.

name: Endocrinology
description: Manages hormone-related conditions — diabetes, thyroid disorders, and metabolic syndromes.

name: Nephrology
description: Specializes in kidney function and diseases — chronic kidney disease, dialysis, and electrolyte imbalances.

name: Pulmonology
description: Treats lung and respiratory conditions — asthma, COPD, pneumonia, and sleep apnea.

name: Oncology
description: Dedicated to cancer diagnosis and treatment — chemotherapy, radiation, and tumor management.
